00096 void ship::update()
00097 {
00098     if (game::over==true)
00099     {
00100         SDL_Surface * surf= gm_engine->render_text("jura_medium-24","Game Over");
00101         gm_engine->blit(view::width/2,view::height/2,surf,0,1);
00102     }
00103 
00104         //std::string str = 22;
00105         SDL_Surface * text= gm_engine->render_text("jura_medium-12",convert_int_string(game::lives));
00106         gm_engine->blit(20,20,text,0,1);
00107 
00108         SDL_Surface * text2= gm_engine->render_text("jura_medium-12",convert_int_string(resources::control.size()));
00109         gm_engine->blit(20,40,text2,0,1);
00110 
00111     Uint8 *keystate = SDL_GetKeyState(NULL);
00112 
00113     if ( keystate[SDLK_UP] )
00114         speed+=play_area::scale*.15;
00115     if ( keystate[SDLK_LEFT] )
00116         direction+=10;
00117     if ( keystate[SDLK_RIGHT] )
00118         direction-=10;
00119 
00120     if ( keystate[SDLK_r] )
00121     {
00122         reset_counter++;
00123         if (reset_counter > 30)
00124         {
00125             reset_counter=0;
00126             game::reset=1;
00127         }
00128     }
00129     else
00130         reset_counter=0;
00131 
00132     if ( keystate[SDLK_SPACE] )
00133     {
00134         shot_counter++;
00135         if (shot_counter > 10 )
00136         {
00137             float tmpx,tmpy;
00138             tmpx=x+(cos(round((direction/22.5)*22.5)*M_PI/180)*(rect.w/5)); // ugly, sure ! does it work, well kind of ...
00139             tmpy=y-(sin(round((direction/22.5)*22.5)*M_PI/180)*(rect.h/5)); // it needs improvemnt
00140             resources::control.push_back(new shot(gm_engine, tmpx+(rect.w/2), tmpy+(rect.h/2), round(direction/22.5)*22.5 )); //direction based off of var image_number below
00141             shot_counter=0;
00142         }
00143     }
00144     else
00145         shot_counter=0;
00146 
00147     physics();
00148 
00149     rect.x=x;//+rect_w_offset/2;
00150     rect.y=y;//+rect_h_offset/2;
00151 
00152     controller * self=this;
00153     controller * ctrl = rect_collide_all(rect,this,0);
00154 
00155     if (!ctrl==NULL)
00156     {
00157         if (ctrl->id_type=="astroid")
00158         {
00159             game::lives-=1;
00160             game::reset=true;
00161         }
00162 
00163         if (game::lives < 1)
00164             game::over=1;
00165     }
00166 
00167     view::x=(rect.x+(rect.w/2))-(view::width/2);
00168     view::y=(rect.y+(rect.h/2))-(view::height/2);
00169 
00170     if (view::x < 0)
00171         view::x=0;
00172 
00173     if (view::y < 0)
00174         view::y=0;
00175 
00176     if (view::x+(view::target_width) > play_area::scale_width)
00177         view::x=play_area::scale_width-view::target_width;
00178 
00179     if (view::y+(view::target_height) > play_area::scale_height)
00180         view::y=play_area::height-view::target_height;
00181 
00182 
00183     int image_number=round((direction/360)*16);
00184     if (image_number > 15)
00185         image_number=0;
00186 
00187     SDL_Surface * surf=sprites.at(image_number);
00188 
00189     //SDL_Surface * rects=SDL_CreateRGBSurface(SDL_SWSURFACE,rect.w,rect.h,8,128,64,128,128);
00190 
00191    //gm_engine->blit((rect.x-(rect.w/2))-image_offset,(rect.y-(rect.h/2))-image_offset,surf,0);
00192    gm_engine->blit(rect.x,rect.y,surf,0);
00193    //gm_engine->blit(rect.x,rect.y,rects,0);
00194 }

00196 void ship::physics()
00197 {
00198     if (speed > play_area::scale*3)
00199         speed=play_area::scale*3; //3 is the speed constant
00200 
00201     if (speed > 0)
00202         speed-=play_area::scale*friction;
00203     else
00204         speed=0;
00205 
00206     //wraping
00207     if (direction > 360)
00208         direction=0;
00209     if (direction < 0)
00210         direction=360;
00211 
00212     if (x > play_area::scale_width)
00213         x=0;
00214     if (y > play_area::scale_height)
00215         y=0;
00216 
00217     if (x < 0)
00218         x=play_area::scale_width;
00219     if (y < 0)
00220         y=play_area::scale_height;
00221 
00222     int tmp_direction=round(direction/22.5)*22.5;
00223     x=x+(cos(tmp_direction*3.14/180)*speed);
00224     y=y-(sin(tmp_direction*3.14/180)*speed);
00225 }
